title: Groteskly boring
content:
I have posted a couple of pics before on this topic. I am still looking for the font/fonts that have influenced/comprised the following logos:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Van_den_Bosch_6157.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Nigeria_Airways_2_4074.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Nigeria_Airways_1_4579.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ICI_Petrol_5810.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Dan-Air_London_2_5390.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Dan-Air_London_3762.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Boeing_5726.png)

Here were some initial thoughts from the two previous posts ( [www.typophile.com/node/17379](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17379 "www.typophile.com/node/17379"), [www.typophile.com/node/16442](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16442 "www.typophile.com/node/16442"))

Sneakers  
Radiant  
Modula Bold/Modularity  
Antique Olive  
Bullet  
CA Magic Hour (closest yet)  
Something by Karl Gerstner?  
“It may be an older proprietary font for a signmaking device like the Gerber SignMaker.”

Anyone?

 [‹ Doormat typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32022 "Go to previous forum topic") [computer tablets? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30424 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nick Job

comments.content:
They look kind of like Serpentine, except that has little spike serifs.

I was not aware ICI was a petrolium company. They only sell paint out where I am.

URW Charter Oak is very similar to many of your examples:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/")

David Thometz
Nice collection, Nick. I am also reminded of Peter Bruhn’s [London](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FT.118673.0.2).

From Jacques Tati’s [“Playtime”](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/393637039/in/set-72157594286837940/), (again in an airport context, remarkably):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/FirefoxScreenSnapz003_5545.png)
